Intro.0: Hackers abused a bug in Instagram’s API and gained access to prominent users’ contact information. The company confirmed that email addresses and phone numbers were stolen.
Intro.1: Facebook, Instagram, Tinder, and other sites were down for about an hour. Facebook is back up now and has sent a brief word  of how a change in infrastructure configuration could have caused the outage.
Intro.2: Hackers abused a bug in Instagram’s API and gained access to prominent users’ contact information. The company confirmed that email addresses and phone numbers were stolen.
Intro.3: Facebook, Instagram, Tinder, and other sites were down for about an hour. Facebook is back up now and has sent a brief word  of how a change in infrastructure configuration could have caused the outage.
Intro.4: Backdoor used by the Russia-linked cyberespionage group Turla obtains the address of its C&C server from comments posted to Instagram  [Read More]
Intro.5: Hackers are selling phone numbers and email addresses of millions of celebrities and other high profile Instagram users  [Read More]
